product_name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 82H802M6IN 11th Gen Core i7 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

detail.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 82H802M6IN 11th Gen Core i7 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 15.6" FHD Laptop

details.description_text: CPU: Intel Core i7-1165G7RAM: 8GB Soldered DDR4-3200Storage: 512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe 3.0x4 NVMeIGPU: Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics Functions as UHD GraphicsDisplay: 15.6" FHD (1920x1080) 250nits Anti-glareThe Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 82H802M6IN is a versatile and high-performing laptop designed for both productivity and entertainment. Powered by the 11th Generation Intel Core i7-1165G7 processor, it ensures seamless multitasking and fast processing speeds. This model features a large 15.6-inch Full HD TN display, delivering vibrant visuals and a comfortable viewing experience for work or streaming. With 8GB DDR4 RAM, expandable up to 12GB, and a fast 512GB SSD, the laptop offers ample memory and storage for your files, documents, and applications. Integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics provide smooth visuals for everyday computing and light graphics tasks. The laptop comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Home and features a slim, lightweight design for easy portability. It is equipped with multiple input/output ports, including USB 3.2, USB 2.0, HDMI, and an SD card reader, allowing flexible connectivity to external devices. The IdeaPad Slim 3i offers up to 7 hours of battery life, making it suitable for on-the-go use, and comes with a 2-year warranty for peace of mind.
